Selavy

Selavy, part of the prestigious DiDonna group of galleries, had an unsual brief. Seldom do the worlds of modern ecomerce and old masters come together in this bold, contemporary take on selling art.

Homepage

Object Oriented

The initial hero section is clear of any superflous elements that might distract the eye from the objects being showcased by this large fullbleed image.

1

1.

Object Oriented

The initial hero section is clear of any superflous elements that might distract the eye from the objects being showcased by this large fullbleed image.

Custom Map Colours

Maps are an essential element to include for any gallery with a physical space - but the default colour schemes offered by google are a little garish in this instance, so a more muted colour scheme was created.

2

2.

Custom Map Colours

Maps are an essential element to include for any gallery with a physical space - but the default colour schemes offered by google are a little garish in this instance, so a more muted colour scheme was created.

Artwork Page

New Thumbnails

Normally, thumbnails are often considered as an afterthought - however when you have such exquisite imagery to work with it makes sense to flaunt it as much as possible with these large, user friendly thumbnails.

1

1.

New Thumbnails

Normally, thumbnails are often considered as an afterthought - however when you have such exquisite imagery to work with it makes sense to flaunt it as much as possible with these large, user friendly thumbnails.

User Messaging

Messaging informs users how to look at images in much greater detail - with the image simultaneously zooming and panning when tapping.

2

2.

User Messaging

Messaging informs users how to look at images in much greater detail - with the image simultaneously zooming and panning when tapping.

Responsive Thumbnails

Thumbnails are simplified for mobile devices, providing the same functionality but in a more efficient manner when it comes to screen real estate.

3

3.
